mapper.select: SELECT m.message_id, m.sender_email, m.receiver_email, m.content, TO_CHAR(m.sent_at, 'FMHH:MI AM') as sent_at, mem.nickname, mem.imgurl FROM message m JOIN member mem ON m.sender_email = mem.email WHERE (m.sender_email =#{friendEmail} AND m.receiver_email =#{username}) OR (m.sender_email =#{username} AND m.receiver_email =#{friendEmail}) ORDER BY m.sent_at
mapper.insert: insert into message(message_id, sender_email, receiver_email, content) values(message_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{receiverEmail}, #{content})
